data.title: Air Traffic Control
data.meta_description:
EGLL - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a summary of information for London Heathrow Airport (EGLL/LHR) including:

- Communication frequencies for ATIS, tower, ground, and radar services.  

- Location details like latitude, longitude, elevation.

- Runway information including lengths, widths, surfaces and lighting for runways 09L, 09R, 27L, 27R.

- Noise abatement procedures including preferential runway use, restrictions on reverse thrust and nighttime operations. 

- Information on low visibility procedures that are implemented during CAT II and III operations.
